About.Aboutme: My name is Keenan Timmie I am an aspiring developer currently studying at Life Choices Academy I would say I am a junior developer, I started dabbling in coding from 14 just simple stuff at first never took CAT or anything like that so I had to teach myself. After a while I gradually tried harder and harder coding languages I would describe myself as a hard worker and an ambitious SOB (Son of a Birch) Nothing's ever enough for me, The road to success is not a road, but a ladder all that matters is climbing higher and higher until you reach the top. in my spare time I like to read history, play games read novels and code. I would like to say I'm a people person but that'd be a fib and that's illegal (I think). Honestly if I could just summarise as to what my goals are is that I want to be an example, coming from a hopeless suburb (Mitchells Plain) where people think everyone is lazy and useless I want to prove them wrong and I want to prove to the people of Mitchells Plain that through hard work and dedication you CAN have better conditions (also better hair).

Education.Awards: Highest Mark for Tourism in Grade 12

skills.Description: I have an intermediate knowledge of HTML and its basics
I have an intermediate knowledge of CSS and how to style webpages using it
I have an intermediate knowledge of Bootstrap and how to utilise it alongside CSS in order to create responsive webpages
I have beginner knowledge of JavaScript and know how to utilise functions, constructor functions variables etc in order to create dynamic and interactive webpages however I have much to learn
I have beginner knowledge of Photoshop mainly editing images, creating wireframes/mockups for prototype web pages and how to utilise various tools like smudge, burn etc
I have beginner knowledge of C# to write scripts
I have beginner knowledge of the ASP.NET client to work in conjunction with C# and to create master pages
I have beginner knowledge of Microsoft Excel to work in order to create spreadsheets
I have intermediate knowledge of how to lead a team and how to give criticism to both my team and leaders
I have an beginner knowledge on how to use the javascript framework known as vuejs
I have an advanced knowledge on how to find mistakes and how to see intricate details

Testimonials.testimonialQuote: A capable individual who keeps to himself often. Very too himself, but also very soft-spoken and respectable. He does what needs to be done without question and gets it done. Simply put, Reliable. -Imraaan Sheldon

It is a great honor for me to share my testimonial for Keenan Timmie. For the times that I have worked alongside him, he always have a strong collaboration character. He is a reliable being. He takes well every challenge infront of him, and always seeks to solve them effeciently. -Sipho Nkebe
Keenan is a highly talented individual that has deep insight in coding. He is a great colleague and demonstrates the ability to work well with others as well individually.
Keenan is a highly creative, well-behaved, and dedicated individual who thrives on collaborating with his peers and excels at working on project assignments

Keenan has a great work ethic, he is very talented and creative. He has great time management skills and puts his all into what he does. He is always willing to help and will be an asset to anyone he works with.

experiences.JobDescription: Test products, work with customers, stock management

experiences.JobDescription: My duties were re-ordering books based on series, alphabetical order chronology, genre as well as monitoring PCs
